title: "The Demand for Industrial Robots has Decelerated"
excerpt: "The growth of industrial robot revenues eased back in 2019 however it is predicted to get again towards late 2020 and quicken in 2021. While the novel Covid pandemic started a couple of months back, March 2020 was the point at which it influenced the worldwide economy."
